oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dolly Parton and Emmylou Harris Radio Special: Together - Side 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of the radio special: Together. Together features Dolly Parton (entertainer) and Emmylou Harris (entertainer) discussion and performance recordings. Product was edited and produced by Warner brothers Records Incorporated. Tape is part one of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dolly Parton; Emmylou Harris
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Together Again [featuring Dolly Parton and Emmylou Harris voiceover] (Emmylou Harris) -- (02:26) Dolly Parton and Emmylou Harris reflect on how they were first introduced, and both preach how both had prospered through each other -- (06:20) An unidentified voice provides a commercial break for Warner Brothers Records Incorporated -- (07:31) Parton and Harris reflect on the positivity of Linda Ronstadt -- (09:05) Love Has No Pride (Linda Ronstadt) -- (12:55) Parton and Harris discuss how influential a song can be and the meaning of writing -- (14:37) Coat of Many Colors (Emmylou Harris) -- (18:07) Harris discusses why she chose to record "Coat of Many Colors" -- (18:39) An unidentified voice provides a commercial break for Warner Brothers Records Incorporated -- (19:50) Boulder to Birmingham (Emmylou Harris and Dolly Parton) -- (20:53) Harris and Parton reflect on how "Boulder to Birmingham" was a transformative song for Parton -- (21:42) Boulder to Birmingham (Emmylou Harris and Dolly Parton) -- (25:33) Harris reflects on the vocal range associated with "Boulder to Birmingham" -- (26:12) An unidentified voice provides a commercial break for Warner Brothers Records Incorporated
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Parton, Dolly; Parton, Dolly, 1946-; Harris, Emmylou;
